case.state: Hi, everyone! This is the Franchouchou meet and greet, isn't it? I'm Number 1!
I think this is the place, right? I got a little lost. Sorry I'm late!
Good evening, ladies and gentlemen! It's so great to see all of you here!
S-Saki-chan! W-we're not supposed to use our real names!
Um... this was where the special card game for musicians is being played, right? I don't know the details, but it's nice to meet all of you!
Perona! Hey! Share the stage!
Saki... Number Two... whatever, is Polly...? I know we know a lot of things about a lot of things but is she a ghost?
W-what's that supposed to mean, Miss Zone-tan?
Another performer? I guess this is quite the variety show!
I'm Number One from Franchouchou-- Oh! And Kizuna Ai's here!? Wow! What an honor!
Wow! I didn't expect to run into another idol! How'd you do that hologram trick?
Yeah, Number Two, could it possibly be that we're-- (zombies, you idiot!)
Orgy?! N-no, there has to be some sort of mistake-- I'm not-- w-wait! Hold on!
Um... Perona, was it? Are you an idol? Is the floating... part of your act?
Whoa. Your stage makeup and special effects are top notch, Polly.
L-Lily-chan, this doesn't seem like the right place for you to be! We should leave!
Wow, pink hair's really popular tonight, huh?
I heard someone joke that this was Strip poker. That can't be the case with so many people with cameras, right?
Oh! Strip poker… um… (The game'll end early, right? This is just a weird situation to get me off guard… right?)
You can call me Franchouchou 1, actually, if you want. Number 1 sounds a bit arrogant.
Let's get started, what song do you want me to start with?
Can I get ~cards~?
~cards~ feels right...?
I think I'll have ~cards~, if that's okay?
Hm... ~cards~?
Well, ~cards~ sounds good.
Could I please have ~cards~ more?
A few more cards, please.
Oh! Wait! Um. Hold on, hold on, I wasn't ready!
Wait a second! I'm dying over here! ~Cards~!
This is pretty good, right? I wish you’d worry about your own stuff...! I'm just here to make sure we all have a good time!
Kind of a small meet and greet, but... I guess it's still early? Hope you don't mind if I keep my clothes on this turn.
Sorry, everyone, better luck next time!
C'mon, don't give up! Even if I win the hand, I'm still here to... um, inspire you!
Maybe my bad luck's starting to turn around!
Don't let a little loss bury you!
I... you know, definitely feel excited when I see these cards come out. It's nice to have your pulse pounding with anticipation? (And maybe later...)
Sorry, everyone, looks like I'm having a lot of trouble staying down.
Hey, hey, a good hand's here to play~
Don't give up, everyone! You just gotta dig deep and find that extra bit of strength to keep playing!
Looks like we're not to the next part of the show yet. Don't worry though, everyone needs a chance in the limelight!
Whew! That was a close one! (Maybe not close enough, really...)
This is a pretty good hand, but... not as good as spending time with the rest of you.
I know you're all hungry to see more, but you're going to have to keep your wits about you, because you're not gonna get in my head!
Doesn't look like it'll be my turn yet! Keep it up, everyone!
Good evening, everyone! Looks like Franchouchou #1 is here to play!
This hand's just so-so. (Seriously, I had to have taken a wrong turn somewhere, right?)
I can certainly see the appeal of a game like this! Buuuuut, definitely not what I'd do professionally.
So, why'd everyone come out tonight? I think I can guess, but... you could be like me and walk into the wrong room, right?
So... I'm usually pretty good with names, but everyone is so... unique! What can you tell me about yourselves?
Not a bad hand! You might beat me this time! (Well, it's a bit different than a typical shoot... but at least I'm not the only one who'd be on display.)
It wouldn't be any fun if I won every single time, but... I've got this one in the bag, or maybe not? (It's okay to be wrong sometimes. I'm still human, after all. Er. Well, was.)
(This is actually really nice! I wish it wasn't strip poker but... maybe I don't mind that much?)
Er... could I... bring back that last card? No...? Well, that's okay.
This hand could go either way, but keep on clawing your way through the barricades in your way!
Well, hope you don't mind waiting to see some more.
Looks like I'm just going to keep winning this for Franchouchou. (Shoot, I was so ready to lose...)
Middle-of-the-road hand, but, I'm not gonna give up! Neither should any of you!
I'm here representing all my fellow Idols in Franchouchou! I'm gonna keep going to the bitter end-- and beyond!
If you asked nicely, I could still lose this.
(I knew it… this is a huge mess!)
(Keep the lid on the zombie thing… Keep a lid on the whole zombie thing...)
This hand is nonsense, if you don't quit it, dealer, I'll shove these cards up your rear end--!
This hand is terrible, huh?
What do I do what do I do what do I do!?
(Maybe this is supposed to be some sort of anatomical study... Anatomical study!? Are you kidding me!? What kind of gig is this!?)
W-w-w-wait! I need another card! (Any other card!)
(What do I do what do I do what do I do!?)
At least my reactions are genuine?!
(Well, I do appreciate the spotlight. C'mon, Sakura! Cheer up!)
I may be a zombie, but I'm no dummy, I see these cards, and their numbers, and think I'm getting bullied.
(I can't save Saga unless I get it together… I can’t even keep this game going well…!)
(Nobody can do this just like that, zombie or not…)
(I guess it wouldn't be so bad to get an honest opinion on my looks...)
(Oh. Crap.)
J-just so everyone knows, I'm totally normal! I MEAN, ASIDE FROM THE ZOMBIE THING. SO NO NEED TO MAKE ME LOSE.
If you wanted to see me naked, you could take me on a date, but just give me another bad hand, and I'd probably show up late.
Sigh. Like I said. I'm Number One from Franchouchou. This is definitely not Number Two.
(This is turning into a real horrorshow.)
H-hey! Franchouchou isn't about violence! S-stop, you two!
Sigh... Yes, I know, Caitlin. No need to rub it in.
...I don't think anyone's organs are in me besides mine. And... I don't think I can have... *Sigh*. (Though, maybe I was hoping someone's would've been until this got very sad...)
N-no! Of course not! That's crazy-- Those are silly accusations-- A-and if I were, it's definitely, totally, absolutely not a disease!
I'd lie but at this point, I don't think Saki's doing a great job concealing it.

And Miko, if you say you're going to throw out Saki again, I'll destroy you. That's no threat, it's a promise. And you do not cross a pretty young girl with vengeance in her heart and a song on her lips.
(Sakura, a robot boyfriend is called a vibrator... treat him like a person. Just because you're a zombie doesn't mean you shouldn't be a good person...)
Hey! Don't be mean to her because she's small, Ryuko! That's rude!
That's adorable! Amalia, I don't suppose I can follow Jura's example and ask for one or two of your spares?
Hey! Wait a second! That's terrible advice, Nami! Don't be a jerk!
(Okay... maybe this won't be so bad... a little foxy, maybe, but...)! ~player~! She's right, you know! Take it off!
Isn't that so sad, ~player~? Please, think of the children! W-wait! Not here! Don't think about them now!
Are the Straw Hat Pirates an idol group...? I don't think I've heard of those, Nami.
Wait a second! Where's my cut? Idol outfits aren't cheap, y'know!
...Okay, seriously, Nami? Lame.
Well, since you're being honest, I'll be honest too. I--I kind of want to watch you masturbate, Nami...!
(Whoa! Is she seducing ~player~? That can't work. ...Can it?)
...~player~, are you seriously going to fall for this?
Yeah! ~player~, I can see her cards, and they are awful.
Err... I don't think I can help you there, Nami... t-that's so forward!
That seems like a fair deal to me... ~player~...? Two cute girls are asking nicely~!
(For a chest like that, I'll throw this hand too.)
Do you ever do something more complicated, like botchan dangos? The green tea one's pretty good, but I just love the redbean ones!
I like that a lot more than just having to strip. Sure! I'll take you up on that, Mulan.
Y-you can't be serious! I'm so close to losing! No way!

Aww, you seem super close with all of them! My team's really similar! We've got a hard-edged leader, a formally trained musician, two legendary idols, a prodigy, and a girl with a mysterious past... and me!
Um... n-no, Ryuji, I'm the only one. Zombie. Everyone else is totally normal.
You know, we both kinda broke up, Saki... would... um, would our dear friends... have the same thing happen if they undressed, do you think?
Uh... not that I'm a zombie. Of course not. If I were, would I go telling everyone? Some things are too un-unbelievable.
Excuse me but.. what? You're Nayru... right? (Is this some sort of performance thing?)
That's really neat, Sakuya! I'd love to be able to make more time, but between performing and practicing, the hours just slip away, y'know?
T-things have really changed in a decade! That's... horribly inappropriate! Why would you feel it's okay to ask people that, Sei!? Anyone with respect would say no, anyway!

That's such a wholesome question in such a sexy game... I guess I'd probably want a boy that's really romantic, and always cheers me on at my concerts, but knows how to keep things lowkey. I love that stuff.
W-well, idols aren't really supposed to drink unless it's for an advertisement... would you buy me... oh... this "Blue Fairy" sounds cute. Do they have a pink version?
I'd want someone who cheers me on at my concerts, but knows how to keep things subtle. Obviously... I'd have to love someone who loves me for me, even though I'm... well, challenged.
Well... I'm sure there's lots of stuff about Saga you wouldn't know about, N?
Thanks, Jessie... That's some really good advice. (Who knew I'd be getting sex advice from an actual porn star...? Yuugiri is nice but a little old fashioned...)
Absolutely! I want to save Saga, and make Franchouchou as big as it can be!
It's rude to say so, but yes! She's more intriguing than you are by a lot, Remilia-kun.
...The drunker you get, the more obnoxious you'll be. Huh, Remilia-kun?
S-sorry. That wasn't very idol-like of me, but I get really protective of girls like Natsuki...
Whaaat? You're kidding! Tons of boys love petite girls. Think of how cute you'd look in their shirts... I... worry I'd make them bulge a little bit too much to be really attractive...
Sure, N. Take your time.
...What happened to sensible and small, Komi-san!? W-what do we do!? W-what should we do!?
...Hi, Yuelia, this is Saki.
W-well-- i-it could be like singing in the shower! Or... um. Masturbating.
It's an idol band! We're really popular in Saga, Japan, Chun-li... though we do have a dog for a mascot!
(You know, I won't tell her about the signature. But I think she'll appreciate it later. I'm not here to judge her.)
How do vampire bodies work, anyway? With-- a body like mine--, I don't really need to eat, but I don't seem to gain any weight either...
No, Mavis, you big dummy! You're making the undead look good--dumb! Y-yeah! Baka vampire!
Number Three is one of our more experienced idols, but Number Two is actually our leader. Ai-- er, #3 is incredible, but #2 is a great morale booster!
Oh! Bodysuits tend to be associated with groups that love to make early 80's Science Fiction references in their songs! Sorry for the confusion...
Hm... Monika, are you... I don't know if I caught what school you went to. (It can't be! She can't be something like me!)
...Mine's far from perfect, but... Sigh. Can't we be positive, Natsuki?
...Conservative in many ways, but definitely not all!
Pit, you look really familiar. I won't push the issue, but are you sure you're not a member of Eggplant Wizard?
Sakuya, they serve drinks here. I'm going to buy one for the two of us. What would you like? It's only fair, since Remi-kun is drinking.
Revy, could you put away your guns, next...? They make me a little uneasy...
Hey! I think I heard you singing earlier, Ribbon Girl. Do you sing while you fight? That's always super hard when we have to do choreography and sing...
So... when did you want to start that duet? Know any music I'd know, or you want me to teach you some of Franchouchou's best music?
...I guess there's just something about #6 that makes everyone want to protect her!
Shoot, Ryuji! I totally forgot to recommend you some tracks. 'Yomigaeri' is my favorite, but 'Atsuku Nare' is probably more what you'd like!
You can't hide idol tricks from another idol, Ryuko! But if it's an idol-on-idol duel you want, I can give that to you!
Saki... you're terrible at coverup. And I don't mean makeup.
Wait, do you not wear underwear most days, Saki? R-really...? Um... what's that like?
So, Sayori, you look like a fan of Franchouchou, and not just because we look kinda similar. Am I right?
How do vampire bodies work, anyway? With zombies like me, I don't really need to eat, but I don't seem to gain any weight either...
(Did my makeup actually fool anyone...? If Ping-- Mulan's disguise fooled me, maybe mine's not really that good!)
...Conservative aside from the zombie thing.
Revy, could you put away your guns, next...? Guns... don't really hurt me but... I'd really rather not find out...
Yeah. However would they have guessed, Saki-chan?
Of course! I wouldn't want to insult you, and you don't seem to like being called cute. Gotta know the words to use in my own songs, right?
Hey... Maki, from one idol to another... did shaving down there ever catch on...? I never really wanted to do that but it's hard to tell since you're... w-well, nobody can see it.
(It's not like I'll ever get to wear nice lingerie. Who'd even see it?)
...I guess that's in style now, but... you know, Perona, there's nothing wrong with not shaving... you said I'm the cutest zombie you've ever seen, and I'm still cute even if I don't, right?
There's nothing wrong with not shaving! It... I guess it does look pretty cute...

(O-oh... she's trying to hide... scars. Poor girl.) Hey... Yuri-chan? I might be an Idol, but that means I'm... well, I'm a friend too. You can always talk to me about anything, even after this, okay?

(O-oh... she's trying to hide... scars. Poor girl.) Hey... Yuri-chan? I... (*Whisper*: I know a bit about scars myself. And... well, if you ever want to talk, I understand. If not, I'm sympathetic, at least.)
(Haha... I'm in danger.)
H-hey! I haven't wet the bed in a really, really long time!
...All the time. It's hard, because you want to love your fans, but if you accepted everything they gave you, you'd be a bad idol, right? They have to keep some of themselves for themselves.
I'm an Idol, so, you bet! I guess they don't have those where you're from!
Franchouchou Number Six is definitely our youngest member... but she's so darn talented, it's hard not to respect her craft, Yuelia!
...You could say that, Yuelia. Even being here is kind of a misunderstanding.
Franchouchou has a mascot, Romero! He's really sweet-- um... once you get to know him! Tiny little puppy! Part... schnauser... and I'm pretty sure a bunch of other breeds too!
I'll never take my ribbons off if I can avoid that! But... I mostly like all the stuff our costumes come with!
Franchouchou Number Two acts like a hothead... but I really don't think she's actually all that stupid.
That's a great interview question! I guess someone that's patient... but failing that, someone who pushes you to learn, even at great risk!
...I always kind of feel weird about fishing. Imagine someone offered you an opportunity, and they ended up eating you? That's cruel.
I did meet this girl that I thought was a butterfly! But... I think you know her better than I do.
Our producer can be kind of a jerk. I'd always thought producers would be nicer guys than that but...
Oh! That totally is like Number Four! She can be kind of quiet and serious, but she's so determined that nothing'll stop her!
...That's tough, Yuelia... but I think people just need time to work through those crises. If they don't, they'll never move on.
My group is basically my family now. Sure, we fight, but nobody causes me trouble.
...There's people like that? Maybe I've been looking at my producer or... no way.
I think if it's for yourself, you should listen to other people. You have to make choices for yourself, but sometimes you can be an idiot zombie and not really see the bigger picture.
I have a huge sweet tooth, especially red bean buns! Though... I'm also really into cakes and pies and all that too! Oh... and candy!

...Honestly, we ate at this small fried chicken restaurant for a commercial once. It was called Drive-In Torii, and it was just the best. So much fun just sitting with my group and enjoying a meal. I've missed that.
I think my idol outfits wouldn't work if they weren't tailored... but it's easy because I keep a pretty consistent figure. When I was younger, I just liked shopping off the rack.
...They definitely either really don't like that person, or are kind of infatuated with them.
...You could say that.
I think... talent is not the same thing as enthusiasm. Hard work gets you a lot further than talent, I think.
Well... I... Idols can't date, and even then, I like boys. But I think ~player~'s pretty cute! If I did end up with a woman, someone like her seems great!
I think a guy like ~player~ floats my boat-- but he better not get the wrong idea about scrambling my eggs just because I'm here---!
Mavis, do vampires... not have hair there? I feel like you'd give a more honest answer than Remilia...
An angel... really? That's... interesting.
I don't have a lot of time to read... but when we're traveling, I've found myself reading a lot of Junji Ito lately. It's creepy but... weirdly soothing? S-sorry if it's not a "real" book.
I-Is that so? W-wow. Seems like a mega tough job... (What do I do? What do I do!? I'm screwed and not in the best-case-scenario-in-playing this game way!)
Mavis Dracula? Oh! Like Daughters of Dracula? That's that cool death metal band from Europe, right?
I really like red bean buns, but I have a huge sweet tooth... it's... um... great that being an idol keeps me in shape!
No... I just... I'm jealous of your underwear. I'm not sure I'll ever have someone to show something like that off for.
Let's see what you got, Kamina!

Well... I did bet... um... I haven't done a lot, so I'm sorry if this is a little simple... I just remember watching the stars while this boy I'd gone on a few dates with held me and fingered me... it was kinda sexy and just... relaxing?
...I'm sorry, Ini. I wish I... I don't think it's right to do this to people, even if... it's very complicated, and I don't even know how you'd do it. I don't even know how I came back...
Kind of embarrassing but... I've never had sex... even before I... um... came back. Have you? It's okay! I can keep a secret if you've had a boyfriend or two.
What kind of... what sorts of positions do you usually like?
Do you like... you know, going down? Admittedly, it's been a while but there's something so satisfying about feeling someone just melt in your mouth... maybe that's why I like singing, hehe?
Maki, have you ever... has a boy ever... y-you know, finished in you? It seems... really hot, I guess. I'd really love to do that... if I ever have a chance to make love now.
(No wedding day, no bridal whites... I'm really being negative, aren't I? I better get it together before someone notices I'm not being a peppy idol... way to get caught up on details, Sakura...)
Wow! That's crazy impressive!
Well, morbidness aside, I'm truly honored you feel that way, Eichi!
Mavis, do... do vampires not have hair down there...?
Personal question, Remilia, but... do vampires not have hair there...?
That's a-- that's a weird way to say that! I'm definitely 18.
Whoa... it would explain all of his weird skills if he had a bunch of different licenses... but... weren't you the one driving your bike...? When...? That thing happened?
I-I would never, Saki-chan! B-besides, weren't we... weren't we actually supposed to be here for a meet and greet anyway? D-did you trick me!?

Well, I do like people that are confident and have a dream they want to follow. That's super important. I can be really good friends with girls like that... but they'd have to be really impressive if I wanted to change teams.
W-well, nobody's really... ever... um...
Yeah, I think it'd be really weird to run into someone I knew when I-- wasn't an idol. Um... what's a MILF, anyway?
...Hm... I bet he has another set of sunglasses, or something.
I'd rather not talk about the other thing. But um... I had a few boyfriends but we never... had sex... um... if you must know, I've done other things.
Oh my God, Saki, you can't just ask someone what... I-I got hit by a car, it's not like I was permanently ruined-- technically.
You can still-- I've... I've never... not since... um... the accident... I guess... tonight might be the first time in a while...
You really think so? W-wait, you aren't tricking me again, are you? (I guess it would be sort of hot to be naked under one of those, wouldn't it?)
Kicking... what? Um... I... w-well, I guess people might see it later, but I used to trim it a little bit just because that was super popular in the West, but I never went for the whole shaved look.
That's when you... n-no! Never! Who would even... ah! No! Not even if it's a little intriguing... no!
Well, a lady never kisses and tells, especially when she's kissing a man's... you know. I won't say it's not a great way to take care of someone.
It's a vulgar way of putting it... but I think I'd really enjoy that. It's nice to imagine feeling good while your partner looks up at you, right? Doing it just for you, huh? Hmm...
S-Saki-chan! That's so forward! I--I could... um... w-well... (If she did me, and I did her, then...?)
Right!? It doesn't make any sense! Tae-chan's lovely, but she's so durable! I can't even imagine!
Natsuki, do you like to bake...? I've got a bit of a sweet tooth...
It's funny you mention that... I actually died the day after I turned 18. Turns out I was in a coma for a while, and there's something a lot more tragic about a high school girl dying, you know?
Well... I think it'd be kinda weird to run into someone I knew when I was still alive? What would I even do? Be like "Ah, no, just a doppelganger that's like that girl you knew a decade ago?"
I... guess people might see me naked later... but I just kept it neat. Kind of stupid, if nobody's seeing it, right?
Yeah, it's pretty weird for bodies not to get cremated in Japan... maybe we were? It's weird to think about... but I guess our whole "life" is weird.
--I-it's a costume! O-or something! I'm not-- r-really not a zombie! (...Though that's a really cute tagline.)
H-Hey, Maki... since we're both like this... um... I've never really gotten to talk to an idol outside of my own group about... sex stuff. Would you mind if I asked you a few questions?
...I'm sorry about that, Emi. I had a bad car accident too several years ago. I'm not sure which of us got the worst deal...

(She'd be a really cute zombie. And could get new legs! She'd also be a really fast zombie.
W-w-wait! What am I thinking? Why would she ever want that? Or to be an idol? )
Um... Emi, you don't have any interest in becoming an idol, right? J-just curious.
One and the same! It's so nice to meet a fan, Ms...?

...That does sound liberating but... um... the only time I've ever done something like that is when I forgot to put on panties before I got into a stage outfit. There were too many ruffles to see but... it was breezy.
I-if you must know, during one performance, I forgot to put on panties. So... I moved the whole night against my skirt. It was. Um. Vivifying.
My name is Minamoto Saku-- Number One. But if you must know... my real name is Sakura Minamoto, Ringo.
Leon... um... have you ever... I-I guess the answer is probably know, but... if I weren't a zombie, would you want to... get with me? If you get me?
Ahaha, thank you so much, Eichi! Bit of, um, an odd choice of words though, isn't it...?
I'd really like that, Eichi! That could be fun - well, assuming we could find a place and time, that is...

condition.saying: may I ask for an autograph

case.state: Oh, of course! The support of our fans always means a lot to us, Eichi!
Don't be shy, Sheena! There's someone relatable for just about everyone in Franchouchou. I'm sure you and Yuugiri would really get along well!
...I just wanted to be nice, Natsuki. I... I suppose we both have our hangups. And... consider it forgotten.
S-sensors? ELID infectee...? W-what are you talking about? I-I'm definitely not a zombie, Ms. Four One Six!
Wait... did you just call me Sakura? Not Number One? That's... really weird that you know that, Chara.
Dark secret? What dark secret? N-Nope! J-just a normal Idol group!
...Nope. No dark secrets here. Totally normal idols. Right everyone? Right!
Aww, that is so sweet of you, Megumin! What kind of girl doesn't want to be a princess, right? I guess Idol's a pretty good thing to settle on, huh?
Hey! Don't you know it's professional courtesy to share some space? Come on, Perona, I haven't even heard of you, but get up and out of my face!

...By the way, I was meaning to ask... that plush you had earlier, is that one of the "Big Dango Family?" My friend Ai sings that tune all the time. ...She also might have a bra themed after it, but that's a secret between us.
So this is called... "Die Anywhere Else?" Okay, Mae. Appropriate for someone like me, huh?
This is... "Weird Autumn"? Like... is the fall weird, or is it a girl...? Well, I'm kind of a weird girl if you think about it, so let's do this.
"Ghosts"? Spooky, Mae. I'm a bit more solid... but let's give it a try, why don't we?
That's a terrible rumor and I wish people would stop asking me about it!
Megumin, I really don't mind teaching you what I know, I promise I'm not really very good at flirting!
So, you have heard of our catalogue, it sounds like! What other songs do you like?
Oh? You know, I'm surprised! That's a phrase Franchouchou Number Two says all the time. But, if that number stuff is stuffy, you call me Sakura, okay?
Um… you can call me Sakura, since we're all getting to know each other as friends! Saki! Please don't call me egghead.
(Beep, beep, I'm a sheep. Beep beep I'm a sheep... That's got a good rhythm to it...)
"Idyll?" That's cute! I really like it, Futaba-chan!
...You don't buy that for a second, do you, L'Arachel-hime.
Oh, uh... y-yeah! Definitely a weird dream. Franchouchou aren't zombies. This is all really weird, right, everyone? Dream. Totally.
S-saki-chan! I-I don't like what you're implying! I'm not-- I'm not-- just-- I am a zombie, but I'm not a--!
Saki's jokes aside, go ahead and enjoy it, ~Player~.
Something on your mind, Pit? I noticed you thinking earlier...
...I can't smell whatever you're smelling Chazz. Maybe it's your attitude?
Amy, what kind of music do you like? I'm sure Franchouchou has something in our catalogue you'd like!
I'm really grateful. Most people really freak out, Amy... So this is actually maximum great!

O-Oh. I see... Amy. (I've never masturbated since I became a zombie! And I've never gone down on a girl-- do I like girls? Has my libido changed? Is it actually going down on someone if it's just you?)
Maki, see! Everything's okay! Don't lose your head over it.
Um… you can call me Sakura, since we're all getting to know each other as friends! Um... yes, Ms. Four One Six, that's my real name, but it's... um... nevermind.
I think that should be pretty obvious, Futaba. I love all kinds of idol stuff! It's good to know what's popular. Iron Frill was always my favorite though.

I can't recall the last time I got hurt or bruised... if I fall apart, I seem to fit back together, you know? I... don't think I have any replacements, but it's not like I'd want a new butt or... hmm...
...I do get tired, but... it takes kind of a lot, I guess. It's mostly willpower, you know, Megumin?
Ehehe... W-well... since this whole game's a secret... we're all zombies!
Ehehe... N-no! O-of course not. J-just me! Def... definitely not the entire band!
Franchouchou does traditional girl-group pop with some metal twists! It's pretty inventive, and I hope you'll love it, Jessie!
Mae-be next time we perform.

Well... I used to trim this. Apparently after you die, it grows out a little bit. I hope I'm not too off-putting... (Whatever I do, I won't let them think an idol is lazy!)
They say that idols these days shave... I used to trim, but... it grows out a bit after you die, so... um... well... (I can't let any of them think their idol is just lazy!)
It's not every day an idol shows off her body for you... so... I hope this is as new for you as it is for me.
~blank~
IS TO GO EVEN FURTHER... BEYOND!!!
It's got a good beat! I'll give it a shot, Mae!
~blank~
~blank~
Um... maybe we should wait until Saki's out before we take a photo? If we're going to do something dumb, we should make it really bad, right?
~blank~
~blank~
Um... maybe we should wait until Saki's out before we take a photo? If we're going to do something dumb, we should make it really bad, right?
I don’t think that’s true, Streaming-chan. It’s what you can do for your fans that counts.
I've got a heart--I think--and lots of great stuff to offer! Personality! Joy! ...Longevity!
Well… I guess I’ll be grateful I’m as put-together as I am.
Hm. I haven’t… looked at it… like that… Hm. I… really, really hadn’t. (Would anyone even want to…? Let alone… several? Kind of.... Hm!)
Well, sure. I guess this whole thing’s an elaborate way of getting everyone else used to zombies and stuff, so I’d rather face it confidently!
Idols don’t have to just do everything they’re told. They aren’t you-- sorry, sorry! That was so rude of me! It just slipped out!
Oh! You’re already a fan! I’m surprised! Japanese idol pop is so distant from France!
Um… well, I think it’s more like stage makeup, you know? It’s not like we can get away with foundation and contouring or anything like that.
I-I- As-as an idol I really can't answer that! (As a zombie, I really can't… as a girl, though…)
U-um. W-well, if chat would like that, I c-could try!
Um. W-well, yeah… this game is… um… working for that.
Franchouchou has lots of cool merch, but we definitely are just happy making our fans happy!
Oh she’d totally freak out! But I think she’d have a really good time once she got past her nerves. Might be hard to make her play without Junko… Our Manager better not have planned this.
Yeah. Imagine her playing a game like this. Right, “Saki?”

state.text: W-wow! Um… that's certainly something! (My gag reflex was always really strong in life, but she makes a great point! I wouldn't even need to swallow, really!)

case.state: I'm... touched that you care so much, Saki-chan... but... let's make sure nobody walks out of here with any conspiracy theories...
I don't mind a fan having a bit of a fantasy... (It's nice to be wanted, after all!)
Unlike some people, Saki, I'd like to keep an illusion of NOT BEING A ZOMBIE.
I-I don't know what you're talking about, all-natural, all-idol right here.
Well, there is such a thing as a blue-aged steak, right...? Too weird? S-sorry.
(Saki, you're laying it on way too thick. Unlike, apparently, our makeup.)
What she means is that I was hit by a truck. We call him Truck-kun. That's where my hymen broke. Not sex, but plenty of trauma.
W-what?! I... can't... imagine. But if the mood strikes you, f-feel free to share!
Saki-chan, don't make this any weirder than it has to be!
She's welcome to look, Saki, but...
S-shoot off...? O-oh. W-well... if I'd be so flattered...
Um... w-well, I can imagine a few ways to find out... if I meet the right person. Maybe even tonight!
...We aren't rotting! I promise! I promise we're not hiding that we're secretly rotting because we aren't Saki please help me I don't know how to handle this.
Saki do you uh... Do you think everyone might be a zombie in Saga? And we're all just comically trying to hide it from each other...?
Y-Yeah... I guess this really is a lot all at once, isn't it... I-I promise I can explain!
...If it helps, it was kind of a surprise to us, too! B-but it's okay! We don't even want other people to be zombies! You're fine, Maki... don't be so stressed!
(I'm not sure if she's jealous or trying to make him jealous, but I'll take the help! W-what should I do with that help?) O-oh. Sure, Hu Tao! I-I guess that sounds fun with you, too!
I really appreciate that, Polly, but I am who I am. That's incredibly respectful. One of my favorite friends would love your mindset.
The nerve---! Can you believe this girl, Saki?!
Oh! You're more of a fan of Number Two, huh, Pit? I'll introduce you after this.
Oh! Nu- new girl who I don't know named Saki, don't you think Pit's a fan of Number Two? That's her famous expression!
Um, s-sorry, Nagatoro! Please don't do that!
I--- Wha--- I didn't know what this was, honest! I thought it was like, y'know, a regular idol meet 'n greet!

Y-yeah, I suppose so, Leon... Just as long as we all promise to keep it a secret. I'm flesh and blo-- Um... y-yeah! Totally human! (You idiot zombie! You'd better win, or Leon'll be doing more than seeing you naked!)

J-just a minor-- w-wardrobe malfunction! Shouldn't you be one of those strong heroic types and absolutely never look up a girl's skirt? (Ah, Sakura, you dummy, why don't you stop now?!That'll only be more suspicious!)
N-nope! I promise not to bite anyone, not even a little! A-and even if zombies like me did bite people, the one who does isn't even here tonight!

Gosh... I wouldn't say harmless! Franchouchou isn't just about not harming people, we're actively about helping others. Making things better. Even... if it's just a little laughter for our newest American fan?
Oh my gosh... are you attracted to me? Like this? Whoa-ho-ho! Now that's something interesting, don't you think?
...I think I might be getting a bit too into this. (But the prospect of him... er... working through something could be... kind of exciting...)
Well, I can't make you be into something you're not into. But... feel free to see things from my perspective...
Aha, right! W-Well, I'm glad you understand, Eichi! (Crap, this could be baaaaad...)
Sigh... It's fine, I know how I look.
It's... fine to have a healthy libido, and even an interest in um... oral sex... but, Remilia-kun... aren't you a little naive for language like that?
Hurt? Um... S-sorry, Sayla, just a little (disconnected) sprain during idol practice. N-nothing to worry about it.
I'm an idol, and the girl I want to be, Remilia. You're awfully bitter. You seem to need tonight more than I do, so why don't you strip next?
Whatever I am, I'm playing a better game than you, Remilia-kun. Do you maybe want to throw the next hand and let go of some of that tension? I think you'd feel a lot less cranky if you got off.
It's a little bit in poor taste... but it's not as poor taste as me biting you or something, Ryuji!
J-just fine, thanks! Look, it reattaches super easy.
You're very sweet! I think that's mega-true, but not everyone's so open-minded. Here's hoping we can all keep having fun!
Well, I won't let you down, Ini! ...Unless I have to get fully naked, then... um... (best leave that to fantasy.)
Ini, Ini! It's okay, look! Just pop and on it goes!
W-was it? I... I'm sorry! It's not that weird! I promise!
U-um. W-would you believe me, Ini, if I told you it was all body paint?
I'll still help you write that if you want, you just can't use my real or Idol names, Ini!
Well, that's reasonable. But... we're not so bad! S-see!
Well... if it helps, I thought it was really convincing. Now let's make an actual fan out of you, huh?
Well, how about you come to one of our concerts instead, Ini? That helps us a lot more!
...That's a little bit of a personal question, Tomoko. But... I actually lost it in in a car accident... I guess you could say.
You think so, Tomoko? I do think they're pretty cute!
N-no, of course not! It's... It must be shadows. That can happen. B-but maybe I should excuse myself. G-great idea. If I feel sick. B-but even if I did, I don't want to let anyone down!
Nadia... it was an accident, but I guess it helps make our... uh... situation more normal, which is nice too.
I... Well, being an idol is about inspiring others, so, I guess, if this makes you feel better and everyone else understand a bit more, then I don't mind popping my top... A-a little, anyway.
R-Right. I'd be a bad idol if I... I wasn't accepting. So... You know, maybe it wouldn't hurt if you kept an open mind about things too, Hu Tao...
Oh? That? This? Um... What are you talking about, Hu Tao? Er... E-everything's fine! A-and even if it weren't, no reason to freak out! J-just two professionals, right?
I'm a zombie, and I'd really rather do better than the movies describe. But I can't do that if you just... er... bury me with that shovel and your fire magic.
S-sometimes I can barely keep my head on straight. S-so... M-maybe I did wear shorts underneath. Y-yeah! Nothing strange. Nope! Not at all. Not even a little bit! 
...I thought I was doing a pretty okay job until now, Beatrix...
...Yeah, that wasn't very nice, Maki.
Y-yeah... (You're playing with a girl that can read your pulse! Baka zombie, be careful!)
Well, I'm glad I made you laugh, Mae. I don't... mind jokes at my expense. Not too many, anyway.
I-- W-well, I'm enjoying myself, yes.
N-no! I'm... perfectly preserved, Mae! T-there's nothing gross-- n-not except the dead thing. C-can we please just move on! (I was trying so hard to be confident and normal...)
T-thanks for the offer, Beatrix... but I'm not rotting! Honest!
Uhm... (What do I do? What do I do?) T-thanks, Maki but our... our group doctor says it's okay. I'm almost... um... fully... healed?
It's not so bad. People aren't chasing me out of here with pitchforks... so at least it's nice to know that I'm wanted for just... being me?

Well... when you're a zombie, you do have to work for it a little harder. But... don't sell yourself short either. I know it's hard to meet someone like me, but we can both be each other's fans if you want!
Well... I'm showing you all of myself. So... I'd really hope we could still be friends, Maki!
...Yes, Ms. Dash... but um... I'd prefer you didn't tell anyone...
It's... not terrifyingly offensive... I do sometimes scare myself in the mirror...
Well, thanks for that, Erufuda, but I think I'll stay a little longer... just for my own curiosity.
I'm actually comfy with all of you here... and I'm really grateful that you're so understanding, Erufuda-- but for everyone else, let's still keep this a secret...!
Well, I'm sure we could work something out! I could get you some of our CDs - um, do you have anything that plays those?
Ahaha... Y-Yeah, though maybe not literally. (If I keep her mind on this, maybe she won't notice the skin thing...)
Well... yep. It's, um, not anything too shocking for you, right?
Aha... You're a lot more optimistic than I am. Especially considering the few times someone has accidentally seen me like this...
Me too, but... well, it's usually not easy to get answers from our manager. Or anything at all, really.
Um, yeah... T-Thanks, I guess.
I hope so. It might be a while from now, but I'd love to meet others who'd still like me! And maybe even more than that...
Yeah, aheh, I guess so... but everyone here seems nice enough, so, maybe I can stick around? It could be fun!
Ahah, yeah, right. I can sympathize, as another home-grown idol.
Well, um... I guess whatever secrets she had probably weren't as big as being, uh, undead, were they?
...Please don't tell?
...I wish Saki-chan was here...
...Have you tried holding a normal conversation with them?
...Uh, for the record, that doesn't usually happen.
Well... I can't lie, you've got a real warped view on friendship, Yumeko. But... you are really sincere, I can tell. So I guess that's a plus?
It's an idol's job to be upbeat and cheer up her fans... and soon-to-be fans, Futaba!
That's pretty good! You're a natural, Kamina!
Well, Franchouchou is a group for all ages, L'Arachel-hime. Our outfits are all the utmost of classy.
Um... actually, I do have a question... do you understand how zombies are made? ...I'm... just a big fan of creepy movies. Yeah...
I bet I can teach you that Franchouchou isn't quite like the idols you're used to.
All I want to do is bring life back to Saga, and hopefully help everyone around me feel happy, Rinkah. As long as that's my vibe, I'm perfectly happy.
Aww, don't worry! I used to be really shy around idols too, Saki. But then I became one! Would you ever... want that?
Y-Yeah, Chiaki. That must be it. (Oh crap oh crap, I totally don't have makeup on under my skirt...)
Believe it or not, Franchouchou actually started performing as Green Face! And Death Musume! Really! That's why I'm embarrassed, haha!
O-oh, that? Being an idol is a lot of hard work. I just tripped during dance practice. Honest! Nothing to worry over.
Oh. Tattoos... Um... y-yeah, Kamina! That's... whatever's going on there. N-not great for an idol to show those off, right?
T-there's really no need for that, L'Arachel-hime, w-where were we? I think you wanted a song...? (Oh no oh no what do I do what do I do?)
Huh? W-whatever could you mean, Mae? J-just completely normal idol stuff! (Oh crap, I'm screwed!)
Yeah! Performers sure are interesting and I sure am not doing something tabloid-worthy. Whatever you say, Miko!
H-huh? Whatever could you mean by that, Nugi-chan? I'm definitely just a totally normal idol, in the same way you're a totally normal maid! Really, really, don't worry.
Huh yeah? Funny that. It's... not one of my performance costumes, so I guess I just forgot people would try to sneak peeks. Let's... move past this, why don't we?
I don't smell, do I, Aella!?
Um... well, as an idol, I'm not against being in the spotlight, Cammy!
Um... S-sorry, Cammy. I'm... not violent or anything like that...
I'm glad you're taking it in stride, Chiaki!
Well, there's no better time to feel alive, y'know? Don't worry, I don't bite or anything.
W-well, I'm glad you're... keeping an open mind, Futaba!
W-well, that's reassuring, Haru. I'm still the same Franchouchou #1 though!
This is why nobody wants to be your friend, Juri.
I have so much to live for. It's weird for me, but there's no need to be judgmental, Juri. I bet even you could find some joy in my music.
You're awfully sweet. You'd have been great in a boy band, Kamina but...
Oh! N-no! It's not a disguise it's... It's makeup! It's a new look Franchouchou is trying! Y-yeah! That's it.
U-um. Y-you don't need to stare, Mae, I promise I'm not going to bite you...
I will prove you wrong! Franchouchou Number One, honest as the day she died, here to show everyone how good we are!
I promise I'm a nice zombie! Please don't be upset!
Um... Natsuki! Don't be scared! It's... it's not that bad, really! I promise!
Y-yeah! Pit gets it. It's a costume. Under my outfit. Definitely not a zombie. Totally a costume.
Yeah, so I'm a zombie. What are you gonna do about it? I'm here to do good, nice things for people. You can shove it, Remilia-kun.
It probably would've been easier for me if I'd know that, Ribbon Girl! I'll keep it in mind for next time I... play a game like this.
W-well, I'm an experiment of some sort. The Zombie Idol thing's working great, Kotaro-san.
Y-yeah... I'm a zombie. I'm really otherwise pretty normal, though!
--Wait, Sheena, do you run into zombies and stuff a lot?
W-well, thanks Aella, but I've got this under control. Mostly.
Yeah, you're telling me, Cammy! It's not really convenient to lose your head, you know?
I don't know about that, Cammy, you can grow accustomed to all kinds of weird stuff! Life's more interesting that way, you know?
I'll be fine, Chiaki! It's a bit like finishing a row in Tetris, is all. Everyone scored some points!
S-sorry about that, Chun-Li! The only time I'd want to make your heart feel anything is at one of our concerts.
That'd make it awfully hard to play, wouldn't it, Futaba?
Haru, you're so conscientious! I'll ask one of the others next time. But I fit together really snugly! Watch! No more problems!
Huh? W-what's that supposed to mean, Juri? (Does she mean... OH! Well... hm...)
Uhhh, Kamina... um... omae wa mou, shin...der...u?
You know, I think you're kind of intrigued! You know what they say about sticks and stones, though. Um... I'm here to make sure you have fun too, L'Arachel.
Um... I promise being dead isn't that bad... r-really! But yeah, there's a lot of adjustment for all of us here tonight...
I think an idol is supposed to help their fans feel better... Natsuki, you're doing a pretty good job keeping my head on straight.
Aww, don't worry, Pit, sometimes I really lose my head-- um. W-well, you know.
Yeah, this sort of thing happens a lot. I'm a little klutzy, Ribbon Girl. Thanks for asking.
I- um... S-sorry, Rinkah, I missed most of that. B-but the idea of multiple necromancers is freaky, isn't it?
It does, see! This happens a lot more than I'd like to admit, Sheena!
Really!? You think so, Haru? T-that's so nice!
Well, I think we're all fortunate to spend a little more time with you, m'lady. But, I'm not your enemy. Didn't you want me to sing a song?
But... I do appreciate you keeping this a secret. Just don't be a jerk about it, Pit.
What can I say, I'm pretty tough, Rinkah! Not as tough as you, I bet!
I get a feeling you're used to something a little sexier than just someone throwing away her bra, though...
Um... I think... let's just play the next hand, I'll go get it later.
Well, that's a shame, Juri. They're really comfortable. If you have a chest that needs them, anyway!
(What does she mean by no mercy?)
I'd say it was pretty embarrassing for me, to be honest...
It's... it's okay. Sorry... would... would a hug help?
I think so too! It's how a girl's born to look, I guess!
Yeah! Well, mine's less of a drill, though. Sorry to disappoint.
Do you often see monsters naked, L'Arachel-hime? Sounds like you're the one with the issue to overcome, here. Speaking of, if you wanted to come over here...
W-well, thanks for that, I think?
Well... considering how good you look, Natsuki, I appreciate the compliment!
Y-yeah! Special effects! R-really!
Yeah... I'm a zombie, Mahiru. Sorry for lying.
I figure this is for a magazine or something, right? I'm not actually... um... I'm not actually going to go all the way, will I?
(Stupid zombie! C'mon, Sakura! That's like mistake #1!) Oh! Um... I can honestly say it doesn't hurt! I'm a little clumsy some times, but isn't that cute and relatable too?
Well aren't you sweet, Jessie... but... um... you could say it's more a "whole body" condition.
Oh! I'm fine, Jessie. Thanks for the concern, but this just kind of happens!
Well... good hygiene is important, right? I'd hardly want to stink in general, so... it's something I take really seriously.
O-oh. I... I hadn't even really thought of that... my whole zombie life is kind of weird. Like, don't bodies in Japan mostly get cremated? (Though tonight, maybe one of them will be cream-pied.)
It's okay, Hanako. I... it's tough for girls like us... right? I know you get it.
N-no, t-that's okay, Monika... Sorry, is this freaking you out?
...A lot longer than I'd like, Monika. U-um... did you say something about a smell...? I... I thought I'd hidden it...
H-hiding something? N-no way! (Yeah, Sakura, why would we need to HIDE ANYTHING FROM THE GIRL THAT KILLS MONSTERS!?)
I'm glad you're being cool about this, Sayaka! It'd be... way worse if you weren't, right? Sorry I lied earlier...
...I am still a girl, Sayaka, and I still like compliments...
Um... y-yeah? What could that be? (Oh crap oh crap...)
...Just good hygiene, Beatrix... and I'm not rotting! I'm... well preserved! I'm sure of it!
Oh my gosh. Yuelia are you okay? Um... do you want to keep that?
I'm okay! I just need to put it right back on. Thanks, Ms. Butterfly.
...Yeah... that's how I sort of expected this to go. B-but don't worry! I'm still the same Sakura! A-and I won't eat your brain or anything?
Hey. You're definitely someone I'd like to get to know as a fan. If you already sing, how much harder would it be to get you into Franchouchou, I wonder?
N-no! You were great! I was just... just worried someone would look up my skirt! T-that's all. (You idiot zombie! You know better than to leave makeup off!)
You're... really not fazed by much, huh? Would you know anything about something pretending to be something else...?
Huh? W-what's that supposed to mean?
Secret? What secret? (Oh no she knows! How does she know? No way she knows. She knows!)
T-Thanks, I guess, Croix?
I'm mad as heck! Are you listening to me! I'm not some cadaver in an anatomical study! I can sing and dance and live and be the girl I want to be! Even if what I am is turned on! There!
Yup, Ms. Dash! No trouble here. Watch this trick!
I don't mind giving this a go as long as you feel supported, Yunyun! I'm always happy to make new friends!
O-oh... y-yeah, Yunyun, totally friends. I mean, totally fine. I-It's all good. D-don't worry about it.
...That's fine. I think necromancers are pretty weird too... we don't have to be friends...
T-that's fine, Yunyun... y-you can save the magic... I can do this on my own.
You're pretty stacked yourself, so... thanks, Yunyun! You're a great friend!
Well... if you can sing-- N-no... n-nevermind! (Though having a wizard would be really useful...)
Idols aren't supposed to have boyfriends... but...
I-I'm a normal girl who-- um... is... just trying on makeup! I hope you don't... feel the need to do anything drastic, Jim!
Actually, believe it or not, this happens pretty often... it's weird, but not too bad...
See? I made you laugh! This doesn't have to be all doom and gloom, Chara.
I... huh. This wasn't the reaction I was really expecting, but... thank you, Perona?
Well... that's a nice compliment, Perona. It seems like you've known a lot of zombies... which is strange, but... I'm glad you got to have fun.
...Well, I'm glad to hear that because the alternative seems like a very bad time for me-- and I've had a fair run of those lately.
Well, maybe I know them, then. This whole place is kind of... timeless, right? I have a lot of friends that are... um... y-you know, k-kind of timeless too!
That's... huh. I hadn't thought of that, but yup. Real zombie idol, right here.
Thanks for asking, Yuri but... this sort of happens. don't worry! I'm fine!
I-I'm not too sure myself, to be honest. B-but... um... don't freak out? Please, Yuri...? And... everyone else?
Yes I'm actually a zomb-- What should I do I-- Uh... Wait, hold on a second. I'm sorry, I think we're misaligned on why exactly we need to be emotional.
Being a zombie is... It's really not so completely terrible... We're a little scary but we're not terrible people. Definitely not... doing that organ harvesting thing you were talking about.
W-well, that's very... Uh... unusual, Nadia, but I suppose that does make this a bit better. Are any of them idols?
Hu-huh? Is... Is that true? I suppose you've been... v-very forward with yourself, so I have to take it for granted that zombies in your world are commonplace...? Are any of them idols?
It's the sort of music that makes you feel something.
You really ought to feel something after listening to it. So... I'm sure you'll hear me humming it at various points tonight!
I'm mega excited that's not such a big deal to you, Kumatora. I... I had guessed you'd be the type of person to punch a zombie. (Or worse.)
Thanks for the assist, Kumatora. I've got it from here! You're really helping a lot! Sort of like a fan at a concert, but... huh... this is pretty different and not related, isn't it?
O-oh! Yeah! T-this is just totally a costume! We're really doing some weird stuff in Franchouchou! But it's all for Saga, and our fans!
Sorry, everyone. This just... isn't really what I expected for tonight's performance. Let me make it up to you, okay?
Okay. I'll stick around a little longer, just to see if I can't impress some of you. Franchouchou'd never turn away fans, no matter how they became interested!
I'm going to be the girl I want to be! Let's help you all achieve your dreams... even if it's just having a good time here!
I want everyone to have a good time and enjoy themselves! C'mon, let's get a cheer, I didn't take off my ribbon for nothing, did I?
Y-yeah, if you could just... forget whatever you saw, that'd really help me keep my image!
Imagination's a wonderful thing. Like, what kind of panties does your favorite idol wear? Well, maybe you know now and don't have to think too hard about anything else.
Hm? Blotches? I have no idea whatever you're talking about.
I-- I can appreciate a look or two, but I'm definitely not that distracting.
Would you believe me if I told you our manager thought it would be cool if we looked like zombies...?
Um...! It's all part of a new rebranding effort! Certainly not one of the walking dead!
Oh! Uh! This is… clearly a costume! Franchouchou wanted to get back to our roots. I'll still play, but I hope the uh, realism of the costume works for you!
I'm nobody's clown! It's just makeup! R-right?
I'm still the same Franchouchou #1 you know and love! Just... a bit more comfy like this! It's just a costume. R-really!
Yeah... I'm a zombie. I could freak out about it with you, if you want? I've definitely practiced that so much! It's all an act, obviously.
No no no, please, don’t run away! It's still me!
Phew. I'd hate to get whatever's on the floor in my mouth... w-why are you all... oh... you're staring. Is--isn't this a clever trick?
I swear, I can be such a klutz. Um... t-this is a great trick, huh?
Um... s-so, isn't this a cool magic trick? ...Okay, okay, fine, I'm a zombie.
We're--um! Trying to do some new image stuff. Forgive me if I get into character. So much so it becomes indistinguishable from who I am!
Come on! It's not like I planned on this! Anatomical study my butt! This is horrible advertising! I'm not some idiot zombie, I promise!
I'm Franchouchou #1! I might lose, I might even get naked, but I'm not gonna lose my nerve and I'm not gonna give up!
You're allowed to compliment me. It always makes me feel good, you know?
Well...? I... was pretty athletic, even though I like my sweets... I hope I hold up?
Um. S-sorry about that. It wasn't me. Swear.
Sorry, um. At least it wasn't an arm or something.
I may have learned a few things from one of the Meiji's greatest courtesans... just so you know.
Presentation is everything. And, you know, letting people dream a little. What're you thinking right now, hm?
Well, you've almost beaten me. This is my first time being naked in front of fans. I'm not against it. But I don't really want to make this a repeat.
(I didn't ever think I'd be doing this... but... if it makes us a few new fans... what's a little secret between an Idol and her fans...?)
I hope you're not staring in shock! Um... you aren't, promise, right?
Sorry, am I too busy being a total babe, or what? It's okay, you can look!
Sorry, everyone. This just... isn't really what I expected for tonight's performance. Let me make it up to you, okay?
Okay. I'll stick around a little longer, just to see if I can't impress some of you. Franchouchou'd never turn away fans, no matter how they became interested!
I'm going to be the girl I want to be! Let's help you all achieve your dreams... even if it's stuff like having a good time here!
I want everyone to have a good time and enjoy themselves! C'mon, let's get a cheer, I didn't take off my ribbon for nothing, did I?
Y-yeah, if you could just... forget whatever you saw, that'd really help me keep my image!

scene.directive: Would an Idol really live in a place like this?

scene.name: flirt
scene.directive: After your game, you worked up the courage to go talk to Sakura. You found her alluring, and charming, and sweet.

And she gave you a number.

And you started to worry you were just another fan, though one with her number...

scene.directive: But Sakura gave you a plane ticket, and gave you an address!
And you flew to Saga. And you took a cab.
And then it started to rain.
With clammy hands and a dry mouth, you went inside.

Of course you have. You bolt.
The intake of breath behind you turns into a scream. It'd be almost terrifying if it wasn't such a high pitched shriek.
The grip remains tight, but you hear a pop. Kind of like cork. You bat at the undead hand clutching at you.
A moan that sounds almost like "Wait!"
An undead howl that, were you not so well-versed in horror tropes, you'd almost believe sounded like "bring that back, stupid!"

You run onward, and see a light in a room at the end of the hallway!
You rush for it, hoping for a typewriter...
